languages.text: "Изменники, дерзнувшие предать сво{mf|его|ю} госпо{mf|дина|жу}. Они ликовали с именем Кунрада Войгтвира на устах, но отправятся на другую сторону, шепча лишь твое".
languages.translation_comment: стейт 1 — для игроков, которые играют с 1 главы/пролога
стейт 1 — для игроков, которые играют с 1 главы/пролога

languages.text: "These renegades committed treachery against their Domin. Their lips once praised the name of Kunrad Voigtvir, but it is your name they will whisper as they cross over to the other side."
languages.original_text: "Изменники, дерзнувшие предать сво{mf|его|ю} госпо{mf|дина|жу}. Они ликовали с именем Кунрада Войгтвира на устах, но отправятся на другую сторону, шепча лишь твое".

traits.locale_text: "These renegades committed treachery against their Domin. Their lips once praised the name of Kunrad Voigtvir, but it is your name they will whisper as they cross over to the other side."
"Renegades who dared to betray their {mf|lord|lady}. They once cried out the name of Kunrad Voigtvir with great joy, but they will cross over to the other side whispering your name and yours only."
"These renegades committed treachery against their Domin. Their lips once praised the name of Kunrad Voigtvir, but it is your name they will whisper as they cross over to the other side."
"These renegades committed treachery against their {mf|lord|lady}. Their lips once praised the name of Kunrad Voigtvir, but it is your name they will whisper as they cross over to the other side."
"These renegades committed treachery against their Domin. Their lips once praised the name of Kunrad Voigtvir, but it is your name they will whisper as they cross over to the other side."
"These renegades committed treachery against their Domin. Their lips once praised the name of Kunrad Voigtvir, but it is your name they will whisper as they cross over to the other side."
"These renegades committed treachery against their Domin. Their lips once praised the name of Kunrad Voigtvir, but it is your name they will whisper as they cross over to the other side."

languages.text: « Ces renégats ont trahi leur Domin. Leurs lèvres louaient autrefois Kunrad Voigtvir, mais ce sera votre nom qu'ils murmureront lorsqu'ils passeront de l'autre côté. »
languages.original_text: "These renegades committed treachery against their Domin. Their lips once praised the name of Kunrad Voigtvir, but it is your name they will whisper as they cross over to the other side."

traits.locale_text: « Ces renégats ont trahi leur Domin. Leurs lèvres louaient autrefois Kunrad Voigtvir, mais ce sera votre nom qu'ils murmureront lorsqu'ils passeront de l'autre côté. »
« Ces renégats ont trahi leur {mf|seigneur|seigneure}. Leurs lèvres louaient autrefois Kunrad Voigtvir, mais ce sera votre nom qu'ils murmureront lorsqu'ils passeront de l'autre côté. »

languages.text: «Estos renegados han cometido traición contra su Domin. Sus labios alabaron el nombre de Kunrad Voigtvir, pero será el suyo el que susurren al pasar al otro lado».
languages.original_text: "These renegades committed treachery against their Domin. Their lips once praised the name of Kunrad Voigtvir, but it is your name they will whisper as they cross over to the other side."

traits.locale_text: «Estos renegados han cometido traición contra su Domin. Sus labios alabaron el nombre de Kunrad Voigtvir, pero será el suyo el que susurren al pasar al otro lado».
«Estos renegados han cometido traición contra su señor{mf||a}. Sus labios alabaron el nombre de Kunrad Voigtvir, pero será el suyo el que susurren al pasar al otro lado».

languages.text: “这些叛乱分子背叛了秘者，他们的喉舌曾经赞颂过昆拉德·维特威尔的名字。不过，当他们到了彼岸之后，他们只会低声颂唱你的名字。”
languages.original_text: "These renegades committed treachery against their Domin. Their lips once praised the name of Kunrad Voigtvir, but it is your name they will whisper as they cross over to the other side."

traits.locale_text: “这些叛乱分子背叛了秘者，他们的喉舌曾经赞颂过昆拉德·维特威尔的名字。不过，当他们到了彼岸之后，他们只会低声颂唱你的名字。”
“这些叛乱分子背叛了他们的{mf|主人|l女主人}，他们的嘴唇曾经赞颂过昆拉德·维特威尔的名字。不过，当他们到了彼岸之后，他们只会低声颂唱你的名字。”

languages.text: 「この反逆者たちはドミンを裏切りました。彼らの唇はかつて、クンラッド・ボイトヴィルの名を讃えたが、向こう側へ渡る際に囁かれるのはお前の名だ」
languages.original_text: "These renegades committed treachery against their Domin. Their lips once praised the name of Kunrad Voigtvir, but it is your name they will whisper as they cross over to the other side."

traits.locale_text: 「この反逆者たちはドミンを裏切りました。彼らの唇はかつて、クンラッド・ボイトヴィルの名を讃えたが、向こう側へ渡る際に囁かれるのはお前の名だ」
「この反逆者たちは陛下を裏切りました。彼らの唇はかつて、クンラッド・ボイトヴィルの名を讃えたが、向こう側へ渡る際に囁かれるのはお前の名だ」

languages.text: "Diese Abtrünnigen haben {mf|ihren|ihre} Domin verraten. Einst haben ihre Lippen Kunrad Voigtvir gepriesen, doch wenn sie auf die andere Seite übertreten, werden sie Euren Namen flüstern."
languages.original_text: "These renegades committed treachery against their Domin. Their lips once praised the name of Kunrad Voigtvir, but it is your name they will whisper as they cross over to the other side."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Abtrünnigen haben {mf|ihren|ihre} Domin verraten. Einst haben ihre Lippen Kunrad Voigtvir gepriesen, doch wenn sie auf die andere Seite übertreten, werden sie Euren Namen flüstern."
"Diese Abtrünnigen haben {mf|ihren Lord|ihre Lady} verraten. Einst haben ihre Lippen Kunrad Voigtvir gepriesen, doch wenn sie auf die andere Seite übertreten, werden sie Euren Namen flüstern."

languages.original_text: "These renegades committed treachery against their {mf|lord|lady}. Their lips once praised the name of Kunrad Voigtvir, but it is your name they will whisper as they cross over to the other side."
